items.content_html: A lightweight web application developed with JavaScript for the frontend, Node.js for the backend, and SQL as the database. Users can log in, add tasks, edit, and delete them, making task management simple and efficient.
items.title: panditigopalakrishna/Task-Manager-Web-Application: A lightweight web application developed with JavaScript for the frontend, Node.js for the backend, and SQL as the database. Users can log in, add tasks, edit, and delete them, making task management simple and efficient.

items.content_html: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.
items.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js service built with Express, Mongoose, and prom-client that collects metrics from your LibreChat MongoDB database and exposes them on a "/metrics" endpoint for Prometheus scraping. Easily integrate with Grafana dashboards for comprehensive monitoring and visualization.
items.title: rubentalstra/librechat-prom-exporter: A lightweight Node.js service built with Express, Mongoose, and prom-client that collects metrics from your LibreChat MongoDB database and exposes them on a "/metrics" endpoint for Prometheus scraping. Easily integrate with Grafana dashboards for comprehensive monitoring and visualization.

items.title: torrinworx/destamatic-ui: A lightweight material component library powered by destam and destam-dom.

items.content_html: SafeStore is an npm package that allows users to encrypt and decrypt files directly from the command line using a password. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and secure. One of its primary use cases is encrypting `.env` files before pushing them to version control systems like GitHub.
items.title: SH20RAJ/SafeStore: SafeStore is an npm package that allows users to encrypt and decrypt files directly from the command line using a password. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and secure. One of its primary use cases is encrypting `.env` files before pushing them to version control systems like GitHub.

items.content_html: A fast, lightweight, and scalable open-source DBMS for modern apps. Supports JSON-based data storage, simple APIs, and secure data management. Ideal for projects needing efficient and flexible database solutions.
items.title: AnkanSaha/AxioDB: A fast, lightweight, and scalable open-source DBMS for modern apps. Supports JSON-based data storage, simple APIs, and secure data management. Ideal for projects needing efficient and flexible database solutions.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
